executable.title: Logistic Contrast Enhancement
executable.description: This is a CLI supporting module and it is supposed to not be used directly with a simple input image.
executable.contributor: Antonio Carlos Senra Filho (University of Sao Paulo), Luiz Otavio Murta Junior (University of Sao Paulo)
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by CAPES and CNPq

integer.name: numberOfBins
integer.label: Number Of Bins
integer.description: Number of bins to build the histograms

boolean.name: flipObject
boolean.description: Invert the contrast enhancement if the object of interest is located at the lower intensity level in the image.
boolean.label: Flip Object

string-enumeration.name: thrType
string-enumeration.description: Threshold method use to split object/background from the image histogram.
string-enumeration.label: Threshold Method
